resources.string: \t\t\t\tLand cuts is an platform providing crypto-inspired trading opportunity. This app can be used to Buy/sell land cuts(parts of land) from around the world which is by default set to 100 initially. There are 100 cuts available for each land and is updated whenever a user buys/sells share. The land properties are added by admin and their initial price is also set by admin considering current value in that location. Once a user buys a share of land it\'s share price is increased by INR 1 and decreased by same amount while selling.
